Headline: #1 Bronzeville/Union Station, #4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express Northbound Reroute near Indiana/32nd
ShortDescription: NB 1 Bronzeville/Union Station, 4 Cottage Grove, X4 Cottage Grove Exp. buses temp. rrted: Indiana, 33rd, Prairie, 31st, and Indiana near Indiana/32nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #1 Bronzeville/Union Station, #4 Cottage Grove, and #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Indiana, 33rd, Prairie, 31st, and Indiana, due to street blockage near Indiana/32nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Campbell
ShortDescription: NB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Campbell.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Christiana
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rrtd EB: Jackson, Homan, Harrison, & Kedzie; WB: Kedzie, Congress, Homan, and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Christiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Christiana, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Homan, Harrison, and Kedzie.

Westbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Congress, Homan, and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.
